short_description: Wooden magnetic Mickey Mouse calendar with wooden magnets

product_description: Product Description This unique calendar lets kids join Mickey Mouse and friends to identify days and dates, plan for special events, and report the weather! kids three and older will learn calendar concepts and feel a greater sense of control and responsibility when they use the more than 80 wooden magnets on the decorated wooden board to track things like the season, temperature, and even how they are feeling. Use a dry-erase marker on the blank magnet to personalize a holiday, weather, activity, or mood - - wipe it clean to use again and again! magnets store conveniently on the back of the hanging wooden calendar. From the Manufacturer From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
